author: jdotpz
content:
# Made a list of some of my favorite tools/apps/services

While I was writing our Mozilla Foundation DevOps wiki, I wrote about a few apps/utilities I love.
Here's some of that list!

**Services I like**
* Lastpass -- Password/Secret Management/Sharing
* [WhatsMyDNS.net](http://www.whatsmydns.net) -- Great way to check DNS propagation
* [WebPageTest](http://www.webpagetest.org/) -- Test your sites speed, compare to other sites, good options and output.
* whatismyip.com -- I constantly am having people go to this site to tell me their real ip address.
* [keybase.io](https://keybase.io) -- A promising every-mans gpg encryption tied with your social accounts
* [irccloud](https://www.irccloud.com/) -- Decent IRC client over https, always on, good mobile apps. $5 a month.  *PS...If you need an invite, let me know!*
* [Geckoboard](https://mozillafoundation.geckoboard.com/dashboards/BFEBA42E00074683/) -- Decent dashboard service, with lots of plugins and connected services such as Google Analytics, New Relic, AWS Cloudwatch, etc...

**Mac / Browser Apps I Like**
* [LICEcap](http://www.cockos.com/licecap/) -- Great utility to record your screen into animated gifs.
* [Cyberduck](http://cyberduck.io/?l=en) -- Great FTP/SFTP/S3 file manager client
* UTC Bar, New Relic Menu Bars, Stay, Window Magnet from Apple App Store
* [Chrome](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/rest-console/cokgbflfommojglbmbpenpphppikmonn?hl=en)/[Firefox](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/restclient/) Addon REST Console/Client (Console=Chrome, Client=Firefox)
* [Iterm2](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/rest-console/cokgbflfommojglbmbpenpphppikmonn?hl=en) Terminal Replacement
* [Sublime Text 2/3 ](http://www.sublimetext.com/)  -- Great text/doc editor
